OOC: This is going to be my only post today, I'm going to my Swimming 
Championships. Anyway, here is my comic relief character.

::Woleritron::

    The wolverine awoke early that morning to go out and hunt, little did he 
know that there was something hunting him. The wolverine stalked quietly 
through the shrubbery, hunting a caribou. Then he got a whiff of something 
unnatural.
    All of a sudden a metallic creature sprang from the trees. It grabbed the 
animal, a strange process took place, especially for a Transformer. Instead 
of scanning the DNA of the animal this Transformer melded with it. There were 
side affects though. One being the temper that he had. After a few hours of 
merging everything calmed down. The Transformer stood up in his new robot 
mode. He looked himself over. In between his fingers were silver studs. He 
made a fist. from the studs three claws popped up, then he tried the other 
hand, the same thing happened.
    "Wolveritron, Beast Mode," The bot commanded. Nothing happened. 
"Wolveritron, Pretty please Beast Mode?"
    Nothing again. He started in on the signal of the Maximals, they were in 
for a big surprise.
